  1. Click add link
  2. Start type something (e.g. "S")
  3. Press down key to select suggest
    AR: Down key works as selection for issues

Dmitry Gizatov
What do you think? how we should improve it?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531312803197,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2954656","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-48186","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Mikhail Kapusta I talked with Artem and decide to show the checkbox if we don't have priority. For a first implementation. After that, we need an option in project settings about it.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531732579798,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2954823","author":"Mikhail.Kapusta","authorFullName":"Mikhail Kapusta","issueId":"JT-48186","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Dmitry Gizatov
Ok, let it be checkbox
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531734770547,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3011816","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-48186","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov we talked with Artem and decide to show checkbox instead this placeholder.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1533899836643,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3012522","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-48186","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
we talked with Artem and decide to show checkbox instead this placeholder.

Dmitry Gizatov we don't show a checkbox here at all, because it's not needed here
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1533912610599,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3035890","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-48186","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

In blocks without selection, we can show placeholder. Zeplin: https://zpl.io/bJvZx9J

In blocks with a selection, we can show checkboxes.
This issue will be obsolete when we make "what show in this icon" setting for a project.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1534927997164,"updated":1534928117453,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3036215","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-48186","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Dmitry Gizatov it's not a perfect solution, because we have projects that don't have Priority at all. I this case we will always see this useless placeholder
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1534935100239,"updated":1534935113975,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3036309","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-48186","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

STR: view any issue with links

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1535383733155"},{"name":"updated","value":"1535383733155"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"rekolobov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Roman Kolobov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"rekolobov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Roman Kolobov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-945","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Verified by","value":[{"value":"rekolobov","fullName":"Roman Kolobov"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 74","id":"YouTrack:sprint 74"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image","id":"74-560238","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image?file=74-560238&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48875","entityId":"25-2100883","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48875"},{"name":"summary","value":"Issue links block content depends on profile settings endpoint"},{"name":"description","value":"

2018.2.44907

Implications:

  • cannot view previousy collapsed links in R/O mode
  • slower rendering of previously collapsed links block, especially when writes hang or fail for whatever reason

STR:

  1. Open any issue with links
  2. Ensure that (new) links block is collapsed
  3. Reload the page
  4. Throttle/block/fail-fast /api/admin/users/me/profiles/appearance endpoint
  5. Try to expand issue links

AR: links won't load until POST /api/admin/users/me/profiles/appearance succeeds (which means that they won't load at all if this request fails).
ER: links are loaded independently of profile settings endpoint

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1535383271568"},{"name":"updated","value":"1535383318285"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"rekolobov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Roman Kolobov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"rekolobov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Roman Kolobov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-945","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Verified by","value":[{"value":"rekolobov","fullName":"Roman Kolobov"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 74","id":"YouTrack:sprint 74"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48587","entityId":"25-2076328","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48587"},{"name":"summary","value":"Suggest to apply refactoring, if use changes working hours"},{"name":"description","value":"
Rest API:
to apply refactoring add property

performScale : true

to update request.

Also there is new property
isScaling
in work time settings. It indicates that scaling is in progress and no modifications allowed.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1533549657222,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3026397","author":"Scott.Adams","authorFullName":"Scott Adams","issueId":"JT-48587","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Dialog title: Recalculate spent time
Body: Spent time is currently calculated based on [x] working hours per day

  • To recalculate spent time based on [new value] working hours per day, click Recalculate
  • Keep existing calculations for spent time, click Cancel

Buttons: [Recalculate] [Cancel]

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1535015962768,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48222","entityId":"25-2047223","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48222"},{"name":"summary","value":"Handle case if WF requirements doesn't allow do add link from "yt-issue-linking-dialog""},{"name":"description","value":"
Build 43327
1. Goto FSI, click "add link"
2. Select several issue and try to set link duplicate (one of selected issues should have different visible to)
AR: WF message "Duplication of issues with different visibility groups is prohibited"
And it's not clear what issue should be fixed

possible solutions:
1. rewrite WF and show issue ID for message
2. Somehow highlight issue on "yt-issue-linking-dialog" popup
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1531388675247"},{"name":"updated","value":"1535014012709"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Scott.Adams"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Scott Adams"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Mikhail.Kapusta"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Mikhail Kapusta"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"4"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-48173","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-945","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Fix versions","value":["2018.2.next"],"valueId":["2018.2.next"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 74","id":"YouTrack:sprint 74"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Screen Shot 2018-07-12 at 12.27.00.png","id":"74-544507","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/Screen%20Shot%202018-07-12%20at%2012.27.00.png?file=74-544507&c=true"},{"value":"image.png","id":"74-558519","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image.png?file=74-558519&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-3035827","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-48222","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

I suggest to highlight the issue with error and rewrite WF.

"You can't Duplicate issues with different visibility groups. ID-1354, ID-34523"
Maybe @Scott Adams can help us with wording here.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1534926394496,"updated":1534926430042,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3037302","author":"Scott.Adams","authorFullName":"Scott Adams","issueId":"JT-48222","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Mikhail Kapusta - which workflow is responsible for this behavior?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1534952988821,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3037461","author":"Mikhail.Kapusta","authorFullName":"Mikhail Kapusta","issueId":"JT-48222","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Scott Adams
In my example WF: youtrack-state-machine-js (rule "Different duplicates issues visibility") do not allow duplicate issue with different "visible to".
But same problem could happen for a variety of WFs.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1534957288760,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3038234","author":"Scott.Adams","authorFullName":"Scott Adams","issueId":"JT-48222","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Mikhail Kapusta - I have a few concerns with this issue:

  • youtrack-state-machine-js isn't bundled with YouTrack. It's our own statemachine rule that is only attached to the YouTrack project in our installation. I don't understand why you would want to add special handling in the UI for a single workflow. This isn't a single issue view / frontend / usability problem, it's a poorly worded error in our own workflow.
  • I can see how "the same problem" could happen with a variety of workflows, but we can't predict which conditions block users from linking issues in all cases. It should really be up to the user who writes the workflow to write informative error messages.

In this case, this is our workflow in our project and we are responsible. I would update the error message in the workflow to read:

You can't link issues with different visibility restrictions as duplicates in the YouTrack project. 
To add these links, update the visibility settings for: [list of issues, comma separated]

We can change the message in the workflow to use the first sentence without rewriting the rule. If we want to use the second sentence and include the list of issues with conflicting visibility, somebody needs to add that logic to the workflow.
